original_text: And it shall be on the day when ye shall pass over Jordan unto the land which the Lord thy God giveth thee, that thou shalt set thee up great stones, and plaister them with plaister:
korean_text: 너희가 요단을 건너 네 하나님 여호와께서 네게 주시는 땅에 들어가는 날에 큰 돌들을 세우고 석회를 바르라

sentences.original_text: And it shall be on the day
when ye shall pass over Jordan
which the Lord thy God giveth thee
that thou shalt set thee up great stones
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 너를 위하여 큰 돌들을 세울 것이며
